item.title: GOP megadonor Ken Langone is latest billionaire to blast Trump's tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump's tariffs threaten to paralyze international trade, risking market collapse and a global recession.

item.title: Politicians urge calm in Europe after Trump tariffs drive 'stock market earthquake'
item.description: "The stock market earthquake from Japan through Europe to America must be survived without nervous decisions," Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said ...

item.title: Commerce Secretary Lutnick doesn't back down in face of market sell-off: 'The tariffs are coming'
item.description: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said the Trump administration remains committed to implementing its reciprocal tariffs amid a global market sell-off...
